event_name: Exclusive Event: Microsoft Security Partner Roundtable
description:
Join us for an exclusive Microsoft Security Partner Roundtable with Aarti Borkar, Corporate Vice President of Security, Customer Success, and Incident Response at Microsoft.
This interactive session, taking place at Microsoft Offices, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, offers a unique opportunity to engage directly with Microsoft leadership, discuss key security trends, and gain insights into the latest advancements in Microsoft security solutions.

speakers.name: Aarti Borkar
speakers.title: Corporate Vice President of Security, Customer Success, and Incident Response
